channel.title: NationWide Classifies
channel.description:
Hello my name is joshua coombs and i am currently a website developer in school! i had a big idea to work on a website a big one! so i decided to make a classifies website where people can sell what they wants totally free! if anyone is interested in helping or want more information then please message me the sites code has been written and is fully functional:
[u][b]The website is written in the following languages:[/b][/u] -Mysql -PHP -HTML -CSS -Perl
[u][b]If you want to help out here what we need:[/b][/u] -Server management -Website Designer -GFX Designer -Business Head -Advertisers
First look! we obv need designers :P
[IMG]http://i45.tinypic.com/b8tes6.gif[/img]
